title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build modern applications with Amazon Aurora DSQL (DEV308)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Aurora DSQL 构建现代应用程序 (DEV308)
abstract: As organizations modernize applications for scalability and agility, database architecture becomes crucial. This session explores Amazon Aurora DSQL, a serverless, distributed SQL database for next-generation workloads. Learn to build modern serverless applications using Amazon Aurora DSQL with Amazon API Gateway and AWS Lambda. Examine performance characteristics, scaling behavior, and cost considerations, along with current limitations. Gain insights on choosing Amazon Aurora DSQL for modernization efforts, comparing it to alternatives like Amazon DynamoDB and Amazon Aurora Serverless v2.
abstract_cn: 随着组织为实现可扩展性和敏捷性而对应用程序进行现代化改造,数据库架构变得至关重要。本次会议探讨 Amazon Aurora DSQL,这是一个为下一代工作负载设计的无服务器分布式 SQL 数据库。了解如何使用 Amazon Aurora DSQL 与 Amazon API Gateway 和 AWS Lambda 构建现代无服务器应用程序。研究性能特征、扩展行为和成本考量,以及当前的局限性。深入了解如何为现代化工作选择 Amazon Aurora DSQL,并将其与 Amazon DynamoDB 和 Amazon Aurora Serverless v2 等替代方案进行比较。
